Modernized Accounting Services

Service Suite

Full range of Accounting and Bookkeeping services for small to mid sized companies including:

Operational Accounting
  • Accounts Payable
  • Accounts Receivable
  • Expense Reports
General and Management Accounting
  • Bank Reconciliations
  • Balance Sheet Reconciations
  • Journal
  • Ledger
Financial Management
  • Budgeting
  • Cash Flow analysis
  • MIS

Seyom Advantage: From Data to Insights.

We will follow a 3 phased process to get you insights useful for decision making

  • 1. Processing of invoices post verification through expert accountants
  • 2. Preparation of periodic financial statements
  • 3. Automation of information gathered from above for upgradation of systems and processes to generate real time insights from financial data

Use Cases

Our accounting and bookkeeping processes can reduce our clients’ monthly workload by 20%-30% or more with even greater saving in cost. Contact us for a demo on how we can work to:

Seamlessly transition accounting and book keeping services to India

Represent the insights generated from these services via real time reports and dashboards

Automate accounting services and integrate them with ERP
